text: Cupania is a plant genus in the family Sapindaceae. ==Selected species== Camboatá (Cupania vernalis) * Cupania alternifolia * Cupania americana * Cupania glabra * Cupania guatemalensis * Cupania vernalis ; horticultural names * Cupania elegans L.Linden., 1893L.Linden. title: Cupania
